text.p: -- J.P. Morgan analyst Roger R. Threlfall said he initiated coverage of AlliedSignal Inc with a buy rating, saying it should be a core investment holding because of its "superior management team, growth prospects and upside earnings potential."

-- He said, "Ongoing cost reduction and productivity improvements are both important components of AlliedSignal's culture,(in addition to how its) management is evaluated and rewarded. We believe this creates an environment in which the company's performance will exceed our and the consensus expectations."
-- Shares were up 1-1/8 at 65-3/4 in late morning exchange trading.
